section.title: Data Type Description
section.para: Packet = {StreamIndex, KeyFrame, Pts, Dts, Flags, Duration, Size, Data}

para.literallayout: Packet = {StreamIndex, KeyFrame, Pts, Dts, Flags, Duration, Size, Data} StreamIndex = internal Stream Index KeyFrame = is this Packet a Key Frame Pts = Presentation timestamp in time_base units. Dts = Decompression timestamp in time_base units. Flags = Special purpose of the Packet is encoded in Flags Duration = Duration of this packet in time_base units, 0 if unknown. Size = Packet Data size Data = Packet Data

{fileinfo, File}-> {FileName, FilePath, FileSize, Format, StreamCount, Duration, Rate}
File = Full Path to the File incl. FileName FileName = only the FileName FilePath = only the Path from the File FileSize = total file size, 0 if unknown Format = container File Format StreamCount = Number of the Streams in the File Duration = duration of the stream, in AV_TIME_BASE fractional seconds. Rate = total stream bitrate in bit/s, 0 if not available.
{streaminfo, File, StreamIdx}-> {0, StreamIdx, CodecType, CodecId, BitRate, FrameRate|SampleRate, TimeBaseNum, TimeBaseDen, Width, Height, Channels, GopSize, PixFormat|SampleFormat, start_time}
